replies.author: 936816697MCfans
replies.txt_content:
1.svs插件不怎么兼容mcpc+
2.你很可能忘记装ProtocolLib前置插件了http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/protocollib/files/下载最新的3.6.4即可
